feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.8.54
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for terms on subscirptions v3 by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9504
  • Cleanup for Stripe webhooks. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9507
  • Fixes for gateway fields override by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9511
  • Fixes for client filters for synthetic props. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9512
  • Redirect client to dashboard at login if enabled by @CarrnellTech in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9501

New Contributors

  • @CarrnellTech made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9501

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.8.53...v5.8.54

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.8.55
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Task rounding implemented
  • Refactor for start / end of quarters @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9514
  • Version 5.8.55 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9518
  • Redirect client to dashboard at login if enabled -fix #9417 #9501 by @CarrnellTech in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.8.54...v5.8.55

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: 5.8.56

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.8.55...5.8.56

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.8.56

entry.content:
